changeset.author: Dmitry Bogun
changeset.query: MATCH (s:bfd_session) WHERE NOT exists(s.physical_port) SET s.physical_port = s.port - 1000, s.interval = 350, s.multiplier = 3

changeset.author: Dmitry Bogun
changeset.query: MATCH (s:switch)-[l:isl]->(d:switch) WHERE l.enable_bfd AND (NOT exists(l.bfd_interval) OR NOT exists(l.bfd_multiplier)) SET l.bfd_interval = 350, l.bfd_multiplier = 3
